oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Advertisement for a Lecture on the Science of Love in Courtship and Marriage by Prof. H. Foster Smith
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: While TSLA houses an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under current copyright law. Users are solely responsible for determining the existence of such instances and for obtaining any other permissions and paying associated fees that may be necessary for the intended use.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Broadside advertising "Lecture on the Science of Love in Courtship and Marriage" by Prof. H. Foster Smith at the Methodist Church at a cost of 25 cents for adults and 15 cents for children. The advertisement offers phrenological charts for $2 and features testimonials from 1837 to 1860. The only date information is "June 15 and 16."
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Broadsides
Broadsides; Smith, Henry Foster; Phrenology; Marriage
